patterns.name: RainbowKit
obstacles: Terms of service checkbox may appear before connect button
Cookie consent banner may overlay the page

patterns.name: Web3Modal (WalletConnect)
connectionFlow: Look for 'All wallets' or 'MetaMask' in the modal
obstacles: Web3Modal may show a QR code by default - need to find 'Browser Wallet' or 'MetaMask' option
May need to click 'All Wallets' to see MetaMask option

patterns.name: Privy
connectionFlow: Click 'Continue with a wallet': page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Continue with a wallet' }).click()
Wait for dApp to process: page.waitForTimeout(3000)
SIWE Terms: Click dApp 'Sign' button to trigger SIWE popup, then wallet.sign()
obstacles: After wallet.approve(), Privy shows a 'Welcome' dialog with Terms of Service
User must click 'Sign' on the dApp FIRST to trigger the MetaMask SIWE popup
SIWE (Sign-In With Ethereum) is a SEPARATE step from wallet connection
The 'Sign' button may have data-testid='tnc-sign-button' on some dApps

patterns.name: Custom Connect
connectionFlow: Find the connect button using text matching
May need to navigate through a wallet selection modal
Look for MetaMask icon/text in the selection
Some dApps auto-detect the wallet and don't show selection
obstacles: Welcome/landing pages may require clicking 'Launch App' first
Multiple connect button variations on the same page

cookieBanner.strategy: Try to dismiss by clicking 'Accept' or 'Accept All' button

termsAcceptance.strategy: Check the checkbox and/or click 'I Agree' button

welcomeModal.strategy: Look for close/dismiss/continue button within the modal

Rabby Wallet.selectMetaMask: When Rabby is recorded, click 'MetaMask' instead in wallet selection modal

Coinbase Wallet.selectMetaMask: When Coinbase Wallet is recorded, click 'MetaMask' instead
